exceptions.tactic: intros K V U F l Hlinear.
intros K' V U F l Hlinear.
intros K' V' U F l Hlinear.
intros K' V' U' F l Hlinear.
intros K' V' U' F' l Hlinear.
intros K' V' U' F' l' Hlinear.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros K V U F l Hlinear. unfold filterdiff. split. - apply Hlinear. - intros x Hlim. intros y Hy. apply (is_domin_le (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (l y) (l x)) (l (minus y x)))). + apply Hlinear. + intros x' Hlim'. apply (is_filter_lim_locally_unique (minus x' x) zero). apply filterlim_comp_2. * apply Hlinear. * apply Hlim. * apply Hlim'.
